content:
ListSourceHelper Class

In this Article

Used by data source controls when implementing the members defined by the IListSource interface. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

public static class ListSourceHelper

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • ListSourceHelper

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

The ListSourceHelper class is a utility class provided to simplify implementation of the IListSource interface by data source controls. Data source controls that implement the IDataSource interface but do not extend the DataSourceControl class can use the static ListSourceHelper methods in their own implementations of the methods defined by the IListSource interface. Data source controls that extend from the DataSourceControl class inherit these method implementations automatically.

Methods summary

ContainsListCollection(IDataSource)

Indicates whether the specified data source control contains a collection of data source view objects.
GetList(IDataSource)

Retrieves an IList collection of data source objects.

Methods

  • ContainsListCollection(IDataSource)

    Indicates whether the specified data source control contains a collection of data source view objects.

    public static bool ContainsListCollection (System.Web.UI.IDataSource dataSource);

    Parameters

    • dataSource
      IDataSource

      An IDataSource that specifies the data source control to test for associated data source view objects.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the data source control contains a collection of data source view objects; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    Use this method in an implementation of the ContainsListCollection property, passing a reference to a data source control.

    Example

    The following code example demonstrates the design pattern for a data source class that implements the IListSource methods. The ContainsListCollection property calls the static ContainsListCollection method. 

           #Region "Implementation of IListSource"

       ReadOnly Property ContainsListCollection() As Boolean Implements IListSource.ContainsListCollection
          Get
             Return ListSourceHelper.ContainsListCollection(Me)
          End Get
       End Property


       Function GetList() As IList Implements IListSource.GetList
          Return ListSourceHelper.GetList(Me)
       End Function 'IListSource.GetList

       #End Region

            #region Implementation of IListSource

        bool IListSource.ContainsListCollection {
            get {
                return ListSourceHelper.ContainsListCollection(this);
            }
        }

        IList IListSource.GetList() {
            return ListSourceHelper.GetList(this);
        }

        #endregion
  • GetList(IDataSource)

    Retrieves an IList collection of data source objects.

    public static System.Collections.IList GetList (System.Web.UI.IDataSource dataSource);

    Parameters

    • dataSource
      IDataSource

      An IDataSource that contains one or more associated DataSourceView objects, which are retrieved by a call to stem.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames*.

    Returns

    • IList

      An IList of one IDataSource, if the IDataSource has one or more associated DataSourceView objects; otherwise, returns null.

    Remarks

    Use this method in an implementation of the System.ComponentModel.IListSource.GetList method, passing a reference to a data source control.

    The IList object that is returned implements the ITypedList interface. You can use the GetItemProperties method to retrieve a list of PropertyDescriptor descriptors that correspond to the DataSourceView names associated with the data source control from the list.

    Example

    The following code example demonstrates the design pattern for a data source class that implements the IListSource methods. The GetList method calls the static GetList method. 

           #Region "Implementation of IListSource"

       ReadOnly Property ContainsListCollection() As Boolean Implements IListSource.ContainsListCollection
          Get
             Return ListSourceHelper.ContainsListCollection(Me)
          End Get
       End Property


       Function GetList() As IList Implements IListSource.GetList
          Return ListSourceHelper.GetList(Me)
       End Function 'IListSource.GetList

       #End Region

            #region Implementation of IListSource

        bool IListSource.ContainsListCollection {
            get {
                return ListSourceHelper.ContainsListCollection(this);
            }
        }

        IList IListSource.GetList() {
            return ListSourceHelper.GetList(this);
        }

        #endregion
